mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_HISTORY (TRADE_NUM, TRADE_DATE, TRADE_AMOUNT, BALANCE, TRADE_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUM) VALUES ( TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{trade_amount}, (SELECT BALANCE FROM ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM=#{account_num})+#{trade_amount}, #{trade_type}, #{account_num} )
UPDATE ACCOUNT_INFO SET BALANCE = BALANCE + #{trade_amount} WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM = #{account_num}
